title: Self Solving Rubik Cube
detail: Tired of solving Rubik Cube? Our model automatically solves itself quickly and efficiently.
extended_details:
Our Custom made Rubik Cube will capture the cube positions and implement a fast algorithm to go back to the solved state. This automation is done using servo motors, custom made PCB with Micro-controller along with a custom designed Rubik Cube.

Project Proposal Document:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1WfQGW5g1kKlj6D-jz1DR4qaIOQjv7RsZinsVoDq2dUw/edit?usp=sharing
